Text: Ppl plz do not use prioritized file downloading ... set  bandwidth allocation of all files to normal and download the bunch as a whole ... ur killing the torrent.
great_mouse .... plz stop spewing bullshit. there is no virus or trojan.

Priority (1-15) and Bandwidth allocating really don't change much, it's all relative to your connection so the only way it screws someone over is if you download one at a time using priory, But that's no different than a leech and run.
